title: Budget smartphones, laptops get pricier in India as AI crunches memory chip supply
description: Chip companies are making more high-bandwidth memory chips—used in graphic processing units that Nvidia sells for artificial intelligence data centres. This has created a supply shortage of general-purpose chips.
content: Memory chips have become costlier because manufacturers such as Micron Technology in the US and South Korea’s Samsung and SK Hynix have started focusing most of their manufacturing lines on making high-bandwidth memory chips—used in graphic processin... [3100 chars]

title: Seoul shares tumble amid AI bubble fears; won plunges to 7
description: South Korean stocks closed sharply lower Friday, as renewed concerns over an artificial intelligence (AI) bubble weighed heavily on big-cap tech shares.
content: South Korean stocks closed sharply lower Friday, as renewed concerns over an artificial intelligence (AI) bubble weighed heavily on big-cap tech shares. The local currency fell to the lowest level in seven months against the U.S. dollar on massive fo... [2834 chars]

title: Trump and Ronaldo’s viral fake match: When politics meets AI football fantasy
description: A video, created using artificial intelligence, of Donald Trump playing football with Cristiano Ronaldo inside the Oval Office has gone viral on social media. At first glance, the clip looks strikingly real, stirring conversations about deepfakes, digital creativity and the strange mixing of sports and politics.
content: US President Donald Trump has posted, on his social-media platform, an AI-generated video of him and soccer superstar Cristiano Ronaldo playing a vigorous game of keepy-uppy in the Oval Office. In the short clip, both are seen dramatically volleying,... [2279 chars]

title: Advocacy groups urge parents to avoid AI toys this holiday season
description: They're cute, even cuddly, and promise learning and companionship – but artificial intelligence toys are not safe for kids, according to children's and consumer advocacy groups urging parents not to buy them during the holiday season.
content:

title: 'Must-see' sci-fi movie with 'chilling' glimpse into future on Film 4 tonight
description: Alex Garland's acclaimed sci-fi thriller explores whether artificial intelligence can become truly sentient
content:
A chilling vision of the future is set to air on Film 4 tonight.

title: US approves sale of advanced AI chips to UAE, Saudi Arabia
description: The U.S. has approved sales of tens of thousands of advanced artificial intelligence semiconductors to the United Arab Emirates' G42 and regional rival Humain of Saudi Arabia, a major boost for both Gulf nations' efforts to become formidable players in the technology.

title: New study finds AI can weaken antisemitism, not just amplify it
description: Researchers linked to Anti-Defamation League trained artificial intelligence chatbot to counter conspiracy theories about Jews with persuasive facts, with encouraging success
content: JTA — Every day, it can seem, brings a fresh headline about how AI chatbots are spreading hateful ideas. But researchers tasked with understanding antisemitism and how it can be stopped say they have found evidence that AI chatbots can actually fight... [5977 chars]

title: Avoid companies 'wasting' billions on AI - but keep backing Nvidia, says fund manager
description: Fears of a 'bubble' in artificial intelligence stocks have little bearing on the outlook for Nvidia, with the high-flying chip giant set to maintain its dominance for years to come.
